entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers later in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
